law.text: The provisions of KRS 178.405 to 178.425 do not apply to any private road, street, or highway while it exists as a dead-end passway with less than four (4) platted lots or with less than four (4) lots that are not platted. At the time such passway is no longer a dead-end passway, the provisions of KRS 178.405 to 178.425 shall become applicable.
